title: An Integral Approach to Prescribing Scalar Curvature Equations
authors: Ruosi Chen, Huaiyu Jian, Xingchen Zhou
abstract:
We develop an integral approach to obtain interior a priori $C^{1,1}$
estimates for convex solutions of prescribing scalar curvature equations
$\sigma_2(\kappa) = f(x)$ as well as the Hessian equations $\sigma_2(D^2u) =
f(x)$. This new approach can deal with the case when $f$ is of weaker
regularity. As a result, we prove that the $C^{1,1}$ modules of the solutions
depend only on the Lipschitz modules of $f(x)$, instead of the $\|f\|_{C^k}$
for some $k\geq 2$ in all the papers we have known up to now.
